inclusion.criterion: Adult patients 18 years and older with histologically proven locally advanced stage III or IV unresectable Squamous cell head and neck cancer SCCHN (including cancers of oral cavity, oropharynx, larynx and hypopharynx) with no evidence of distant metastasis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A careful evaluation for resection is required from the surgeon and criteria for unresectability carefully defined for individual primary sites as follows: Hypopharynx: The tumor must extend across the midline of the posterior pharyngeal wall or be fixed to the cervical spine
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate organ function (All labs should be obtained within 14 days prior to start of study drug treatment)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: total Bilirubin within normal institutional limits
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: AST (SGOT)/ALT(SGPT) < 2.5 X institutional upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: creatinine within normal institutional limits or creatinine clearance > 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 for patients with creatinine levels above institutional normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to give informed consent and willingness to adhere to study protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects of reproductive potential must agree to follow accepted birth control methods during treatment and for 12 months after completion of treatment.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient who have had prior treatment for head and neck cancer
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior history of radiation to head and neck area
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, which is a type of brain cancer. They have received prior treatment for their cancer, including radiation therapy to the head and neck area.
